## Testing
- [ ] Backend tests: `cd apps/backend && npm test`
- [ ] Frontend tests: `cd apps/frontend && npm test`
- [ ] Seed (if schema/seed changed): `cd apps/backend && npx prisma db push && npm run generate && npm run seed`

## Checklist
See [.github/PULL_REQUEST_CHECKLIST.md](.github/PULL_REQUEST_CHECKLIST.md) for full list. Confirm before requesting review:
- [ ] Lint/type-check pass
- [ ] Existing test coverage preserved or improved
- [ ] No secrets or env-specific values in commits
- [ ] Docs/README updated if user-facing or setup changed
